definition: variant of 輯睦|辑睦[ji2 mu4]
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
surname Mu
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
six close relatives, namely: father 父[fu4], mother 母[mu3], older brothers 兄[xiong1], younger brothers 弟[di4], wife 妻[qi1], male children 子[zi3]/one's kin

harmonious/friendly

open and candid (idiom); not hiding anything/ingenuous
modest and obedient/unassuming
